messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Reserch Paper
messages.msgSnippet: Well..You could try that book that I m reading for my essay. Life Among the Samurai I  don t have the book with me because I turned it in for the due date.
messages.messageBody:
Well..You could try that book that I'm reading for my essay. "Life Among the
Samurai" I don't have the book with me because I turned it in for the due
date. They tell about the famous 47 Ronin. They tell about everything about
Samurai. From their traditions in family and war to Bushido.
I hope that helps! Have a nice day everyone!
~Yami

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Reserch Paper
messages.msgSnippet: ... Do a google search for 47 Ronin or Chuushingura . You ll find more than you can use. Chuushingura is what the 47 Ronin story is called in Japanese. May
messages.messageBody:
--- cgt350 <cgt350@...> wrote:

> Okay. I'm doing a reserch paper for English II and
> the topic
> is "Bushido vs. Gang ethics." i figure i will right
> about The Way of
> Bushido and how gangs relate, but i was wondering if
> there is
> anything else i should add. i am also wondering if
> anyone has the
> tale of the 47 ronin? Just let me know.

Do a google search for "47 Ronin" or "Chuushingura".
You'll find more than you can use. Chuushingura is
what the 47 Ronin story is called in Japanese.

May I ask what your thesis is? I understand you're
comparing the two (Bushido vs Gang) but not quite sure
what your viewpoint is.

And is English II a college course? High school?



__________________________________

messages.subject: Reserch Paper
messages.msgSnippet: Okay.  I m doing a reserch paper for English II and the topic is Bushido vs. Gang ethics.  i figure i will right about The Way of Bushido and how gangs
messages.messageBody:
Okay. I'm doing a reserch paper for English II and the topic
is "Bushido vs. Gang ethics." i figure i will right about The Way of
Bushido and how gangs relate, but i was wondering if there is
anything else i should add. i am also wondering if anyone has the
tale of the 47 ronin? Just let me know.

p.s. if you give me quotes i must have the author's name and page
number.
